messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Byeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/14/03 8:50:12 AM, shyrley@earthlink.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/14/03 8:50:12 AM, shyrley@... writes:

<< Right, I'm off.

See you lot from the other side of the Atlantic. I'll be offline for a

week or so :-( >>

Wow. I just talked to my friend Helena who's doing her last minute shopping
today and leaving England tomorrow to stay here a month. ("tomorrow" meaning
tonight our time). So she and her husband and three kids will pass Shyrley
and kids in the air, and then the world will not be unbalanced one way or the
other.

Good. Physics.

And they're both going toward home.

Good. Christmas.

Sandra

messages.subject: Byeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
messages.msgSnippet: Right, I m off. See you lot from the other side of the Atlantic. I ll be offline for a week or so :-( Byeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee Shyrley
messages.messageBody:
Right, I'm off.
See you lot from the other side of the Atlantic. I'll be offline for a
week or so :-(

Byeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

Shyrley
